segments.text: When can we expect you for dinner ? Can you come tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not tonight . I promised to go to a concert with my sister .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . Shall we say seven o'clock ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll be there . You're still a fabulous cook , aren't you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That'll be for you to decide . I've got a new dish that I want to try out on you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm ready . I'll look forward to it all Friday !
segments.speaker: S2
